title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Narrative-Based Natural Science Concept Understanding and Transfer Promotion Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level Foundational Knowledge in Natural Sciences
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can apply natural science concepts to real-world social problem-solving through narrative-based learning.
Learners can explain the impact of historical context-based narratives on understanding scientific concepts.
Learners can select and utilize narrative learning strategies appropriate to their prior knowledge levels.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
